rationale: The segment describes cases popping up along flyways and does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.

rationale: The segment uses the critical alert phrase 'on really high alert'.
